Peop=
le will use it more extensively and maybe there are still important
things =
to add (I dont think of anything special). When changing the package
name s=
ome stuff could get renamed as @Category=3D>@Categories,
@Categories=3D>Cat=
egoryRunner or something like that.
@IncludeCategory=3D>IncludeCategories. =
Moving stuff from experimental is a
chance for last API-changes and it shou=
ld happen when everything feels real
feature-complete.
